ValidationRule.description: Forces Greeted Entry or Greeted Entry with Click to Join to be selected as Audio Type when Premium and PGi are selected.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Premium Event", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Standard Event", $RecordType.Name <> "RT Event", $RecordType.Name <> "Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "300 Port", $RecordType.Name <> "Webcasting", $RecordType.Name <> "SSBA", $RecordType.Name <> "Webinar Subscription", ISPICKVAL( Booked_With__c , "PGi"), ISPICKVAL( RT_Event_Type__c , "Operator Assisted Premium"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( GX_Event_Type__c , "Greeted Entry")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( GX_Event_Type__c , "Greeted Entry with Click to Join")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PGi Premium events can only be marked as Greeted Entry or Greeted Entry with Click to Join. Please update the Audio Type to either Greeted Entry or Greeted Entry with Click to Join and try saving the record again.
